name: Xap and the Quest for Pediculus
name_original: Xap and the Quest for Pediculus
description:
You are a wizard by the name of Xap. you are in search of a secret object of power known as the Pediculus. you must traverse your way through a reality warping temple against Orbs of pure energy, dangerous giant slug creatures, sharp spikes and a temple guardian who only means to get you out of that dangerous place.

this is my first proper game, and it took me about 2.5 months of work to make from knowing nothing about unity. I am welcoming any feedback or criticism to make it better in the future. thank you for checking out my game!
